arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) assigned by AWS to this Pipeline.

parallelismConfiguration.description: This is the configuration that controls the parallelism of the pipeline. If specified, it applies to all runs of this pipeline by default. see Parallelism Configuration details below.

pipelineDefinitionS3Location.description: The location of the pipeline definition stored in Amazon S3. If specified, SageMaker will retrieve the pipeline definition from this location. see Pipeline Definition S3 Location details below.

pipelineDisplayName.description: The display name of the pipeline.

roleArn.description: The name of the Pipeline (must be unique).

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
